import-psc: Before running this script, you should install the PSCompletions module and import it.

invalidParams:
<@Yellow>You should enter available json path or completion name.
e.g. <@Magenta>.\scripts\compare-json.ps1 psc
     .\scripts\compare-json.ps1 .\completions\psc\language\zh-CN.json
     .\scripts\compare-json.ps1 .\completions\psc\language\zh-CN.json .\completions\psc\language\en-US.json

tip: <@Yellow>The following are different property values or types (count: <@Magenta>{{ $count.diffList.Count }}<@Yellow>):
<@Red>The following tips are missing property in the <@Magenta>{{ $diffShortPath }}<@Red> file (count: <@Magenta>{{ $count.missingList.Count }}<@Red>):
<@Red>The following tips are extra property in the <@Magenta>{{ $diffShortPath }}<@Red> file (count: <@Magenta>{{ $count.extraList.Count }}<@Red>):

invalidParams: <@Red>You should enter an available completion name.
success:
<@Green>Completion <@Magenta>{{ $completion_name }}<@Green> has been created successfully!
It has been linked to the PSCompletions module: <@Magenta>{{ $test_dir }}<@Green>
If hooks are not needed, please delete the <@Magenta>hooks<@Green> attribute in <@Magenta>config.json<@Green>, and relink the completion via <@Magenta>.\scripts\link-completion.ps1 {{ $completion_name }}<@Green>

<@Green>Suggestion: Please disable the completion cache via <@Magenta>psc config enable_cache 0<@Green> to preview the latest real-time changes.
<@Yellow>Note: This link operation is only for the test or development of completion, and remove it via <@Magenta>psc rm {{ $completion_name }} <@Yellow>in time.

invalidParams: <@Red>You should enter an available completion name.
link-completion.exist: <@Red>The completion directory already exists, please use <@Magenta>psc rm {{ $completion_name }}<@Red> to remove it first.
linkDone:
<@Green>Completion <@Magenta>{{ $completion_name }}<@Green> has been linked to the PSCompletions module: <@Magenta>{{ $test_dir }}<@Green>

<@Green>Suggestion: Please disable the completion cache via <@Magenta>psc config enable_cache 0<@Green> to preview the latest real-time changes.
<@Yellow>Note: This link operation is only for the test or development of completion, and remove it via <@Magenta>psc rm {{ $completion_name }} <@Yellow>in time.

invalidParams:
<@Yellow>You should enter an available completion list.
e.g. <@Magenta>.\scripts\update-guid.ps1 psc
     .\scripts\update-guid.ps1 psc,git
